test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min()`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min("a string", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(min(()))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3)) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1)) eq 1`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 3)) eq 1`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3, 1, 5, 1, 1, 3)) eq 1`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3, -5.0, 5, 1, -3, 3)) eq -5.0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min(xs:untypedAtomic("3")) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min(xs:untypedAtomic("3")) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((xs:untypedAtomic("1"), 3, 2)) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3, xs:float(2), xs:untypedAtomic("1"))) eq 1`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-13
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3, xs:float(2), xs:untypedAtomic("1"))) instance of xs:double`.
test-case.test: min((3, xs:float(2), xs:untypedAtomic("1"))) instance of xs:double

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-14
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((1, xs:float(2), xs:decimal(3))) instance of xs:float`.
test-case.test: min((1, xs:float(2), xs:decimal(3))) instance of xs:float

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-15
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3, xs:untypedAtomic("1"), xs:float(2))) instance of xs:double`.
test-case.test: min((3, xs:untypedAtomic("1"), xs:float(2))) instance of xs:double

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-16
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(min((1, xs:untypedAtomic("NaN"), xs:float(2)))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-17
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(min((xs:float("NaN"), xs:untypedAtomic("3"), xs:float(2)))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-18
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((xs:float("NaN"), xs:untypedAtomic("3"), xs:double(2))) instance of xs:double`.
test-case.test: min((xs:float("NaN"), xs:untypedAtomic("3"), xs:double(2))) instance of xs:double

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-19
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((xs:float("NaN"), 1, 1, 2, xs:double("NaN"))) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-20
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((xs:double("NaN"), 1, 1, 2, xs:float("NaN"))) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-21
test-case.description: An xs:string cannot be compared to a numeric, even if a value is NaN.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-22
test-case.description: An xs:string cannot be compared to a numeric, even if a value is NaN.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-23
test-case.description: A type error must be reported even if one of other values is NaN.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-24
test-case.description: A type error must be reported even if one of other values is NaN.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-25
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(min((xs:double("NaN"), xs:double("NaN")))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-26
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(min((xs:float("NaN"), xs:float("NaN")))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-27
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(min((3, xs:double("NaN")))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-28
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(min((3, xs:float("NaN")))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-29
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3, xs:double("NaN"))) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-30
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3, xs:float("NaN"))) instance of xs:float`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-31
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(min((xs:float(-3), xs:untypedAtomic("3"), xs:double("NaN")))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-32
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((xs:float(-3), xs:untypedAtomic("3"), xs:double("NaN"))) instance of xs:double`.
test-case.test: min((xs:float(-3), xs:untypedAtomic("3"), xs:double("NaN"))) instance of xs:double

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-33
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(min(xs:float("NaN"))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-34
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(min(xs:double("NaN"))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-35
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min(xs:untypedAtomic("three"))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-36
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((xs:untypedAtomic("3"), "a string"))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-37
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min(("a string", xs:untypedAtomic("3")))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-38
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min(QName("example.com/", "ncname"))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-39
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min(xs:anyURI("example.com/")) eq xs:anyURI("example.com/")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-40
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((xs:anyURI("example.com/"), xs:anyURI("example.com/"))) eq xs:anyURI("example.com/")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-41
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min(("a string")) eq "a string"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-42
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min(("a string", QName("example.com/", "ncname")))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-43
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((5, 5.0e0)) eq 5.0e0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-44
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((5.0e0, 5)) eq 5.0e0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-45
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3, 5.0e0)) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-46
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((5.0e0, 3)) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-47
test-case.description: Simple test for min() involving xs:date.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-48
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3,4,5)) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-49
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((5, 5.0e0)) eq 5.0e0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-50
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((3,4, "Zero"))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqMINFunc-51
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `min((xs:float(0.0E0), xs:float(-0.0E0))) eq xs:float("-0")`.

test-case.name: K2-SeqMINFunc-1
test-case.description: Invoke fn:min() on two identical xs:anyURI values.

test-case.name: K2-SeqMINFunc-2
test-case.description: Invoke fn:min() on two different xs:anyURI values.

test-case.name: K2-SeqMINFunc-3
test-case.description: Invoke fn:min() on two different xs:anyURI values(#2).

test-case.name: K2-SeqMINFunc-4
test-case.description: Invoke fn:min() with an unsupported collation.

test-case.name: K2-SeqMINFunc-5
test-case.description: Invoke fn:min() with an unsupported collation and one xs:anyURI value.

test-case.name: K2-SeqMINFunc-6
test-case.description: Invoke fn:min() with too many arguments.

test-case.name: K2-SeqMINFunc-7
test-case.description: fn:min() and xs:double promotion.

test-case.description: fn:min() and xs:double promotion.

test-case.description: fn:min() and xs:double promotion.

test-case.description: fn:min() and xs:double promotion.

test-case.description: fn:min() and xs:double promotion.

test-case.description: fn:min() and xs:double promotion.

test-case.description: fn:min() and xs:double promotion.

test-case.description: fn:min() and xs:double promotion.

test-case.name: K2-SeqMINFunc-15
test-case.description: Ensure the return type is properly inferred.

test-case.name: fn-min-1
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:min function with argument to sequence of different types.

test-case.name: fn-min-2
test-case.description: Evaluation of type promotion when using mixed typed with fn:min function

test-case.name: fn-min-3
test-case.description: Evaluation of type promotion when using mixed typed with fn:min function (used derived types)
test-case.test: let $var := fn:min((xs:long(22),xs:short(10))) return $var instance of xs:integer

test-case.name: fn-min-4
test-case.description: Test fn:min on a sequence of xs:dayTimeDuration arguments

test-case.name: fn-min-5
test-case.description: Test fn:min on a sequence of xs:dayTimeDuration arguments

test-case.name: fn-min-6
test-case.description: Test fn:min on a sequence of xs:yearMonthDuration arguments

test-case.name: fn-min-7
test-case.description: Test fn:min on a sequence of xs:yearMonthDuration arguments

test-case.name: fn-min-8
test-case.description: Test fn:min on a sequence of xs:yearMonthDuration and xs:dayTimeDuration arguments

test-case.name: fn-min-9
test-case.description: Test fn:min on a sequence of xs:duration arguments

test-case.name: fn-min-10
test-case.description: Test fn:min on a sequence of numeric arguments
test-case.test: for $p in 1 to 4 let $x := (xs:integer(4), xs:decimal(3), xs:float(2), xs:double(1))[position() le $p] return typeswitch (min($x)) case xs:integer return "integer" case xs:decimal return "decimal" case xs:float return "float" case xs:double return "double" default return error()

test-case.name: fn-min-11
test-case.description: Test fn:min on a sequence of strings

test-case.name: fn-min-12
test-case.description: Test fn:min on a sequence of dates

test-case.name: cbcl-min-001
test-case.description: test fn:min on xs:boolean arguments
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x = 0) then false() else true() }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-002
test-case.description: test fn:min on xs:boolean arguments
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x = 2) then false() else true() }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-003
test-case.description: test fn:min on xs:boolean arguments
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x = 3) then $x else false() }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-004
test-case.description: test fn:min with xs:date argument causing type error
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x < 3) then current-date() else current-time() }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-005
test-case.description: test fn:min with xs:dateTime arguments
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x = 2) then xs:dateTime("1996-12-01T12:00:00") else current-dateTime() }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-006
test-case.description: test fn:min with xs:dateTime argument causing type error
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x < 3) then current-dateTime() else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT3S") }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-007
test-case.description: Test fn:min with xs:dayTimeDuration arguments
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x = 2) then xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT3S") }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-008
test-case.description: Test fn:min with xs:dayTimeDuration argument causing type error
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x = 3) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT3S") }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-009
test-case.description: Test fn:min with numeric arguments
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { (xs:decimal(1.1), xs:float(2.2), xs:double(1.4), xs:integer(2))[$x] }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x)) instance of xs:double

test-case.name: cbcl-min-010
test-case.description: Test fn:min with numeric arguments
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { (xs:decimal(1.3), xs:float(1.2), xs:double(1.4), xs:integer(2))[$x] }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x)) instance of xs:double

test-case.name: cbcl-min-011
test-case.description: Test fn:min with numeric arguments rasing error
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { (xs:decimal(1.1), xs:float(1.2), xs:double(0.4), xs:string("2"))[$x] }; min(for $x in (1,4,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-012
test-case.description: Test fn:min with numeric arguments
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { (xs:decimal(1.1), xs:float(1.2), xs:double(0.4), xs:integer("-3"))[$x] }; min(for $x in (4,2,1,3) return local:f($x)) instance of xs:double

test-case.name: cbcl-min-013
test-case.description: test fn:min with xs:time arguments
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x = 2) then xs:time("12:00:00-01:00") else xs:time("12:00:00+01:00") }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-014
test-case.description: test fn:min with xs:time argument causing type error
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x < 3) then current-time() else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT3S") }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-015
test-case.description: Test fn:min with xs:yearMonthDuration arguments
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x = 2) then xs:yearMonthDuration("P11M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y") }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-016
test-case.description: Test fn:min with xs:yearMonthDuration argument causing type error
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) { if ($x = 3) then xs:duration("P1Y") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P11M") }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-017
test-case.description: Test fn:min with invalid type for first argument
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) as xs:duration { if ($x = 1) then xs:duration("P1Y") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P11M") }; min(for $x in (1,2,3) return local:f($x))

test-case.name: cbcl-min-018
test-case.description: Test fn:min on a range expression
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) as xs:integer { $x }; min(local:f(4) to local:f(10))
